name: Color Smash Mayhem!
description:
Color Smash Mayhem is a new addictive game where all you need to do is escape the striker from other strikers.

This is a new hyper casual game which will keep you engaged for hours.

Mayhem is created with lots of different strikers of vivid shapes and colors. You need to dodge the the striker with the help of swipe.

Swiping left and right will move the striker and then you can go on clearing the levels and create new highscores.

Download the game today and enjoy playing it.
